name: Learn to Fly with a Boeing 717
blurb: A Fun, Professional and realistic Flight Simulation Add-on for FSX and the rewarding experience of flying.

rewards.reward: A Downloadable Model for MS Flight Simulator with 1 airliner, you will get to choose from 20 different options, also you can access to the private discussion forums so you can be up to date with the development process and share your thoughts.

All 15 different liveries available from different airliners around the world plus 5 additional  texture variations, basically 20 different high-resolution textures. You will be able to participate in the beta test, you will be able to try the flight model, the 3D Panel or virtual cockpit, and an operational FMC so you can help improve it, in addition to the previous reward. Also your name will be listed in the credits section.
Previous rewards + A Boxed Copy including the PDF version of the tutorials and manuals, a mouse pad of the flight Deck, and a very special thank you in the Credits section for your great support!.
Previous rewards + An HD Widescreen Poster of the Boeing 717 Flight Deck (suitable for framing).

Additional to previous rewards, + a Boxed Special Edition with The Complete Manuals, Art Book, Procedures, and Tutorials in DVD and Printed Copy, including your DRM Free downloadable copy so your boxed copy stays sealed up.

Previous rewards + The Paint Kit for the B717 for you to create your own liveries + A McDonnell Douglas MD-90 EFD ("Enhanced Flight Deck") Complete Package Model. This aircraft has a glass cockpit and an advance overhead panel, it was the last AND Very Limited version of the MD series. Will include written PDF Manuals, Procedures and Tutorials, 1 high resolution texture and the paint kit so you can create your own liveries.

Previous rewards + The 3D Model from GMax (You can download GMax free in different websites) for both models, the Boeing 717 and the MD-90 EFD; You can look at the design and play with it, you will see what it took to design it, it will give you an idea of 3D art and modeling. On any 3D art design website each model (not even or fairly close to being totally finished) sells for at least $100, but for this reward you will get both very detail and professional models, basically you are getting both of them at the price of one.

Including all previous rewards, plus a 3-4 hours (hopefully at least) of a Weekend (preferably) for "Ride through the clouds". This is by far much better than a "Discovery Flight". We will go for a fun ride up in the air and you get to take one guest with you; We want you to have fun! And if you want, we will teach you on preflight, taxi, take off, flying and landing procedures, and hopefully you might want to try them your self (in the US only, any day after release and before October 2013, also please check with us about weight restrictions).
